title: Chuck Klosterman on But What If We're Wrong
description: Chuck Klosterman, author of But What If We're Wrong, talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the possibility that things we hold to be undeniably true may turn out to be totally false in the future. This wide-ranging conversation covers music and literary reputations, fundamentals of science, and issues of self-deception and illusion.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
